languages.text: {n}Что-то в причинно-следственных связях бытия с щелчком сдвигается, шестерни останавливаются, а затем начинают обратный бег. Пути, которыми шло сущее, видоизменяются, и энергетический щит блекнет, растворяясь в факте своего не-существования. Туда же отправляются и солдаты, коим более не дано было родиться. Судя по перекошенным ужасом лицам, в последний момент они осознали, куда вы отправили их. В никогда.{/n}

{n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в причинно-следственных связях бытия с щелчком сдвигается, шестерни останавливаются, а затем начинают обратный бег. Пути, которыми шло сущее, видоизменяются, и энергетический щит блекнет, растворяясь в факте своего не-существования. Туда же отправляются и солдаты, коим более не дано было родиться. Судя по перекошенным ужасом лицам, в последний момент они осознали, куда вы отправили их. В никогда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backwards. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped, and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who have now never been born follow suit. Judging by the look of horror on their faces, they realized at the last moment where you had sent them. Neverwhere.{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose dans les liens de cause à effet de l'existence bascule et les rouages s'arrêtent avant de se mettre à tourner en sens inverse. Les chemins empruntés par l'univers sont redéfinis et le champ d'énergie se dissipe du fait de sa non-existence. Les soldats qui, désormais, ne sont jamais nés lui emboîtent le pas. À en juger par leur regard horrifié, il est évident qu'ils ont compris au dernier moment que vous les envoyiez dans le néant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose dans les liens de cause à effet de l'existence bascule et les rouages s'arrêtent avant de se mettre à tourner en sens inverse. Les chemins empruntés par l'univers sont redéfinis et le champ d'énergie se dissipe du fait de sa non-existence. Les soldats qui, désormais, ne sont jamais nés lui emboitent le pas. Au vu de leur regard horrifié, ils ont compris au dernier moment que vous les envoyiez dans le néant.{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}Algo en las conexiones de causa y efecto de la existencia cambia con un chasquido: los engranajes se detienen, y después empiezan a girar hacia atrás. Las sendas del universo fluctúan y el escudo de energía desaparece, disipándose ante su nueva inexistencia. Los soldados que nunca nacieron le siguen. A juzgar por la expresión horrorizada de sus últimos instantes, han comprendido en el último momento lo que les esperaba: la nada, la inexistencia absoluta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en las conexiones de causa y efecto de la existencia cambia con un chasquido: los engranajes se detienen, y después empiezan a girar hacia atrás. Las sendas del universo fluctúan y el escudo de energía desaparece, disipándose ante su nueva inexistencia. Los soldados que nunca nacieron le siguen. A juzgar por la expresión horrorizada de sus últimos instantes, comprendieron adónde les enviabas: a la nada más absoluta.{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}某个东西发出了“咔哒”一声，世界的因果关系发生了改变。随后，时间的齿轮停止，向后转动，整个宇宙的路线也得到了重塑。那些能量场逐渐消失，它们存在的事实本身遭到了抹杀。随后是那些士兵，他们诞生的事实也同样遭到了抹杀。从他们脸上惊恐的表情来看，他们在最后一刻才意识到你把他们送到了什么地方。那是一片虚无，从未存在过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某个东西发出了“咔哒”一声，世界的因果关系发生了改变。随后，时间的齿轮停止，向后转动，整个宇宙的路线也得到了重塑。那些能量场逐渐消失，它们存在的事实本身遭到了抹杀。随后是那些士兵，他们诞生的事实也同样遭到了抹杀。从他们脸上惊恐的表情来看，他们在最后一刻才意识到你把他们送到了什么地方。那是一片虚无，从未存在过。{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}存在の因果関係のつながりの中で何かが音を立てて遷移し、歯車が止まり、そして逆回転を始める。宇宙がたどる道は形を変え、エネルギーシールドは消え去り、非実在という事実へと消えていく。今後生まれてくることのない兵士たちもそれに倣う。彼らの恐怖の表情から察するに、彼らは最後の瞬間、自分たちがどこに送られるののかに気づいたのだろう。彼らの行く先は永遠なる無だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}存在の因果関係のつながりの中で何かが音を立てて遷移し、歯車が止まり、そして逆回転を始める。宇宙がたどる道は形を変え、エネルギーシールドは消え去り、非実在という事実へと消えていく。今後生まれてくることのない兵士たちもそれに倣う。彼らの恐怖の表情から察するに、彼らは最後の瞬間、自分たちがどこに送られるののかに気づいたのだろう。彼らの行く先は永遠なる無だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}In den Ursache-und-Wirkung-Verbindungen der Existenz verschiebt sich etwas mit einem klickenden Geräusch. Die Zahnräder bleiben stehen und beginnen dann, sich rückwärts zu drehen. Die Pfade des Universums werden neu geformt und der Energieschild schwindet, löst sich schlicht in der Tatsache seiner Nicht-Existenz auf. Die Soldaten werden nun niemals geboren werden und folgen daher. Dem entsetzten Ausdruck auf ihren Mienen nach zu urteilen, begreifen sie im letzten Augenblick, wohin du sie geschickt hast. Ins Nichts, ins Niemals.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In den Ursache-und-Wirkung-Verbindungen der Existenz verschiebt sich etwas mit einem klickenden Geräusch. Die Zahnräder bleiben stehen und beginnen dann, sich rückwärts zu drehen. Die Pfade des Universums werden neu geformt und der Energieschild schwindet, löst sich schlicht in der Tatsache seiner Nicht-Existenz auf. Die Soldaten werden nun niemals geboren werden und folgen daher. Dem entsetzten Ausdruck auf ihren Mienen nach zu urteilen, haben sie im letzten Augenblick begriffen, wohin du sie schickst. Nirgendall.{/n}
traits.speaker: InquisitorGuardSargeant

languages.text: {n}Var oluşun sebep sonuç ilişkilerinde bir anda bir şey değişiveriyor, dişliler duruyor ve gerisin geri dönmeye başlıyorlar. Evrenin seçtiği yollar yeniden şekilleniyor, enerji kalkanı solarak var olmadığı gerçekliğe yöneliyor. Artık doğmamış olacak askerler, kaderlerine boyun eğiyor. Yüzlerindeki dehşet dolu ifadeye bakılırsa onları nereye gönderdiğini son anda fark ediyorlar: Hiçliğe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something in the cause-and-effect connections of existence shifts with a click, the gears stop and then start turning backward. The paths taken by the universe are reshaped and the energy shield fades, dissipating into the fact of its non-existence. The soldiers who will now never be born follow suit. By the looks of horror on their faces, they realise at the last moment where you have sent them. To never and nothingness.{/n}
